channel.title: Classpath && path
channel.description: Anyone know the value of both variables in Environment Variables in your system's advanced settings? - In simpler terms, what you set them to?

item.title: Classpath && path
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“String, post:4, topic:115663”][quote author=Tico135 link=topic=164945.msg1537645#msg1537645 date=1182660272]
CLASSPATH: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.
PATH: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin
[/quote]
Even when I criticized your spelling and grammar, you still helped me out. Now that’s one kind person. Thanks a lot.[/quote]

It doesn’t matter how anyone treats me, I will always treat them with respect.

Read full topic
